Resistance.help: Lionesses are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Claw_Rake.help: The beast swipes their target with their razor sharp claws causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Claw_Rake.shortHelp: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Claw_Rake.targetHelp: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Vicious_Bite.help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Moderate Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Vicious_Bite.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT (Lethal)
Vicious_Bite.targetHelp: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Wild_Charge.help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} begins a {PowerName} boosting their damage and movement speed.

Lions_Roar.help: At the beginning of battle the Lion will let out a terrible roar that bolsters the defense of nearby beasts moderately for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Lions_Roar.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} lets out an howl bolstering the defense of nearby beast allies!

Lick_Wounds.help: Should the beast become wounded they will lick their wounds to recover a small amount of health and recover additional health over time. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} licks their wounds to heal {Damage} points of health and begins to rapidly regenerate.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Train_Beasts.help: The Lioness has been trained and now can use Lick Wounds and Train Beasts.

Ferocious_Growl.help: The beast rattles her foes by letting out a ferocious growl. Affected foes will be stunned for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

Claw_Swipe.help: The beast lashes out with a very wide swipe of its claws striking all foes in front of them causing Moderate Lethal damage and causing Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Claw_Swipe.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Claw_Swipe.targetHelp: You are bleeding from the Lioness' Claw Swipe.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Tame_Beasts.help: The Lioness has been tamed and can now use Ferocious Growl and Claw Swipe.
